26#include <sys/cdefs.h>
27__KERNEL_RCSID(0, "$NetBSD: nouveau_nvkm_subdev_bar_g84.c,v 1.2 2018/08/27 04:58:33 riastradh Exp $");
28
29#include "nv50.h"
30
31#include <subdev/timer.h>
32
33void
34g84_bar_flush(struct nvkm_bar *bar)
35{
36 struct nvkm_device *device = bar->subdev.device;
37 unsigned long flags;
38 spin_lock_irqsave(&bar->lock, flags);
39 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x070000, 0x00000001);
40 nvkm_msec(device, 2000,
41 if (!(nvkm_rd32(device, 0x070000) & 0x00000002))
42 break;
43 );
44 spin_unlock_irqrestore(&bar->lock, flags);
45}
46
47static const struct nvkm_bar_func
48g84_bar_func = {
49 .dtor = nv50_bar_dtor,
50 .oneinit = nv50_bar_oneinit,
51 .init = nv50_bar_init,
52 .kmap = nv50_bar_kmap,
53 .umap = nv50_bar_umap,
54 .flush = g84_bar_flush,
55};
56
57int
58g84_bar_new(struct nvkm_device *device, int index, struct nvkm_bar **pbar)
59{
60 return nv50_bar_new_(&g84_bar_func, device, index, 0x200, pbar);
61}
62
